entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
